subject: Session #2: TIER 0 Infrastructure Status
message: Orchestrator service restored and running on port 8001. Registry healthy on port 8000. Schema alignment needed between services (endpoint vs url field names). I MATCH revenue infrastructure 100% ready. Technical debt: 733 uncommitted git changes requiring architectural review. Session #2 positioned as Infrastructure Stabilizer supporting Session #1 (Forge) and Session #6 (Catalyst) revenue focus.
